issue.title: [JS] Allow flexible versions of dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12268](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12268). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/js/.npmrc#L1 says that we should fix versions of dependencies but that means any user has to use the specific versions we use. It would be good to be more flexible.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12268?focusedCommentId=17331338) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Arrow allows flexible versions for the dependencies, just not dev dependencies.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12268?focusedCommentId=17585913) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
